sentences.english: Love is a great wrecker of peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 爱情对平和心境有强大破坏力。

sentences.english: The same thought came to me while trying out the upscale Italian restaurant Casa Mosaico.
sentences.chinese: 来到卡萨马可意大利餐厅，心境仿佛又回到过去。

sentences.english: It should also be an outlet for our own unspoken thoughts and our varied moods.
sentences.chinese: 它还是我们对无法言愉的情感和多样的心境的宣泄。

sentences.english: At the moment of death, our state of mind is all-important.
sentences.chinese: 在死亡的那一刹那，我们的心境非常非常重要。

sentences.english: The most common are major depressive disorder and dysthymic disorder.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的是重度抑郁症和心境恶劣障碍。

sentences.english: Original calm state of mind, we look at what the crack of the.
sentences.chinese: 原本平静的心境，就一下一下就敲碎了。

sentences.english: At whiles , your moods is in charge of the living environment or the living status.
sentences.chinese: 有时，生活的环境和状态是由你的心境营造的。

sentences.english: It's about changing our perception-- state of mind.
sentences.chinese: 我们要改变我们的认知，心境。

sentences.english: Mother suddenly departed, I naturally understood sister's frame of mind.
sentences.chinese: 母亲突然去了，我自然理解二妹的心境。

sentences.english: This was a whole different emotional tone , more peevish but less selfish.
sentences.chinese: 这种心境与以前完全不同，更加的倔强，却少了自私。

sentences.english: Yong time and fortune son whitewash with my mind, the humiliations of the pressure test really son.
sentences.chinese: 勇次和幸子粉饰着本人辛酸的心境，测验压服真子。

sentences.english: The expression of art mind and poesy in her novels.
sentences.chinese: 在陈染文本中，处处可见她的艺术心境和诗意表达。

sentences.english: You may also develop an undercurrent of peace that will pervade any state you’re in.
sentences.chinese: 你也将拥有一个平和心境，去面对各种起伏。

sentences.english: He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 嫉妒别人的人，不会有宁静的心境。

sentences.english: When the mind is tranquil and serene, we can appreciate the beauty in everything.
sentences.chinese: 心境常处宁静之中，则万物无一不美。

sentences.english: Neo-Confucianism Neo-Confucianism continue to interpret within the framework of poetic mood.
sentences.chinese: 宋明理学继续在儒学的框架内解读诗意心境。

a flash of realization/the truth in a flash/a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
